Extraordinary OCXO solutions

Xtal Ball Enterprise has created a new generation of advanced oven control crystal oscillators (OCXO) possessing extraordinary combination of utmost frequency stability, low phase-noise level miniature sizes and extremely low power consumption.

Extremely low power consumption:

60 mW at (0-50)ºC, 120 mW at (-40 +85)º C

Very high frequency vs. temperature stability:

to 0.5 ppb in (-40 +85)ºC range

Very low phase noise level:

-115 dBc/Hz@1Hz

-173 dBc/Hz floor

Very low “atomic rank” aging rate:

to 0.03 ppb/day

Very low acceleration sensitivity:

to 0.2 ppb/g

Fast warming-up:

45 s (to 0.1 ppm accuracy)

Miniature sizes:

compatible with DIP8, DIP14 or 20x20x12.6 mm

Owing to the extraordinary performance the Xtal Ball OCXOs are today unreplaceable part of a variety of modern high-end equipment.

Low Power High Stability Oven Control Crystal Oscillators (LP OCXOs)

Basing on unique Internally Heated Resonator Technology (IHRT) providing arrangement of the oven system inside the resonator vacuum holder Xtal Ball’s oscillators exhibit very high frequency stability and low phase-noise level at DIP8 or DIP14 compatible sizes and very low power consumption - about one order less than at the conventional OCXO designs. Owing to the extraordinary performances the LP OCXOs have become unreplaceable solutions for a variety of portable or/and battery fed equipment such as high-end mobile radio, mobile radars, synthesizers, precision clocks, GPS navigation, portable instrumentation and others.

Load spec example to edit and order

High Precision Low Power Real-Time Clock/Calendar

Basing on the LP OCXOs operating at 8.192 MHz or 16.384 MHz frequency these clocks ensure very high precision of 1 s time intervals at very low power consumption and small sizes. Owing to the very attractive combination of properties these clocks are now very demanded part of different modern equipment with battery supply, for instance, of the underwater geological exploration equipment providing its long service-free period at high precision of the geological data.

Load spec example to edit and order

Ultra stable Low Noise Low Power Frequency Reference

These miniature frequency standards using high stability LP OCXO together with PLL discipline option from external GPS or PSS signals provide very high short-term and long-term stability reaching the “atomic” rank of 0.03 ppb/day during long hold-over period. Owing to these excellent performances the references can be successfully used at high-end portable instrumentation and other modern high precision battery supply equipment.
